name: Pipa
behaviour: She is very friendly to everyone. She is ok with being alone but can be a bit stubborn sometimes. She loves frisbees and squirrels.

name: Rusty
behaviour: He is a very loving boy and always needs to be accompanied by someone. He can be a bit forceful on the lead when he is extra excited.

name: Zeus
behaviour: He is a well-behaved boy. He loves tennis balls more than he loves me.
